title: Liberal Democrats rule out backing opposition Labour Party
text:
FILE PHOTO: Leader of Britain's Liberal Democrats Jo Swinson waves after she delivered her speech at the yearly party conference in Bournemouth, Britain September 17, 2019. REUTERS/Peter Nicholls

LONDON (Reuters) - Britain’ Liberal Democrat party leader Jo Swinson said on Sunday she would not back a government led by Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn.

Asked on Sky News whether there were any circumstances in which the party could support a Corbyn-led government, Swinson said: “No, Jeremy Corbyn is not fit to be prime minister.”
description: Britain' Liberal Democrat party leader Jo Swinson said on Sunday she would not back a government led by Labour Party leader Jeremy Corbyn.
